title: IP wrong
body:
It gives me 300 IP that i cannot use. If I want to buy a 4800 champ i need 5100 IP to buy it. 

For example it says that i have 1300 IP but actually i only have 100 IP. Its been like this for 2 months now and im getting annoyed.

replies.body:
This is an annoying bug that pops up almost exclusively on the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to complete your purchase. This should update your IP value in the Beta Client as well.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this didn't resolve the issue.
